EmailTemplate.description: Email to mentees with mentors name and email and also attached pdf of scheduled sessions
EmailTemplate.name: Send Scheduled CESessions Pdf
EmailTemplate.subject: Course Session Scheduled Pdf
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name} ,
Mentor has been assigned to you for the course {!Course.name} you have enrolled for, Mentor name and email is enlisted below
Mentor Name : {!Mentor.Name} Mentor email: {!Mentor.Email}
Please do find the attached file for Course Sessions, scheduled by mentor.
Best Wishes Utilitarian Labs
